Similarity - Class in util
Calculates the overall similarity between two Twitter users by computing and multiplying together the similarity between various pieces of information: - the Jaccard similarity coefficient between the users each of them is following ("friends") - the Jaccard similarity coefficient between the users that follow each of them ("followers") - the text similarity between their biographies, using an approximation of the cosine distance (see Similarity.pseudoCosine(Map, Map)) - the text similarity between the users they mention (using the same pseudo- cosine distance) - the text similarity between their favorite tweets - the text similarity between their regular tweets All these individual simlarity scores are given equal weight.
SimilarityResult - Class in util
Wrapper
SimilarityResult() - Constructor for class util.SimilarityResult
 
Stopwords - Class in text
A stop word is a word that should not be used for indexing or similarity calculations.
Stopwords(String) - Constructor for class text.Stopwords
Creates the instance from the contents of a file (one word per line)
Stopwords() - Constructor for class text.Stopwords
No-arg constructor creates an empty list, which can then be added to by the Stopwords.add(String) method.
